stimulusHtml: In the last judgment of Hu-Nefer, from his tomb (page from the Book of the Dead), the presence of the ibis-headed god Thoth demonstrates that the ancient Egyptians
choicesHtml: believed that truth and justice would prevail in the afterlife
were obsessed about mummifying the remains of the dead
placed great importance in written records and observations
considered their pharaohs direct descendants of the gods
